title: These Birds
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: These Birds combines simple text and colorful photographs to introduce readers to all kinds of birds. The book can also be used to teach students to compare and contrast and to classify information.
reviewWords: birds, crows, doves, eagles, geese, hawks, owls, turkeys
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
wordWork: Suffixes : Recognize and understand the use of suffix -s
